attributes.action: Ensure that all state schools have a democratic system in which the students all have the right to vote for a Headteacher for their school from a selection of volunteering candidates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is often stated that school "sets you up for real life", however, currently in schools children are deprived of the simple right that many others have: the right to choose who governs them. I propose to allow children to vote for their Headteachers in a democratic way.
